title: Add multiplication and division methods to Calculator
body:
Please add the following methods to the Calculator class:

1. Multiply(int a, int b) - multiplies two numbers
2. Divide(int a, int b) - divides a by b (should handle division by zero)

Ensure proper XML documentation comments are added for both methods.

Note: This is a demo issue for showcasing RG.OpenCopilot capabilities.
